name: RIF Retro
description:
Drive your car through traffic and enjoy the fast paced, thrilling arcade racing game. Become a best racer and drive through traffic at crazy speeds. Earn points and buy faster retro cars and upgrades.

The game has three modes with their maps:
1. Classic mode is like every player - the modern and dynamic.
2. Retro mode conveys the atmosphere of yesteryear.
3. Arcade mode will appeal to fans of retro arcade racing.
